actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to impose additional restrictions on the use of airspace in the area of launches and landings of space vehicles, to increase civil penalties for violators of such restrictions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to impose temporary flight restrictions in areas of space launches and landings. Sets forth civil penalties for violations of such restrictions.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to impose additional restrictions on the use of airspace in the area of launches and landings of space vehicles, to increase civil penalties for violators of such restrictions, and for other purposes.
